summary: This document is an email chain from July 25, 2019, regarding a request from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY) for documents and photographs related to an investigation into an incident involving Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on July 23, 2019. The correspondence involves a Supervisory Staff Attorney at the Correctional Law Center (CLC) facilitating the request.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email chain is a request for investigation documents and photographs related to an incident involving him at the Metropolitan Correctional Center on July 23, 2019. He is identified by his registration number 76318-054.

persons.name: Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC
persons.context: The attorney at the Correctional Law Center (CLC) in New York is the sender/forwarder of the email, facilitating the USAO SDNY's request for investigation documents related to Jeffrey Epstein's incident and seeking concurrence for their release.

connections.description: The attorney is corresponding about and facilitating the release of investigation documents related to an incident involving inmate Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Incident Involving Jeffrey Epstein at MCC
events.description: An incident involving Jeffrey Epstein occurred at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. An investigation was opened, and the USAO SDNY is requesting related documents and photographs.

events.title: USAO SDNY Requests Investigation Documents
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York sends a written request via email for all documents and materials, including photographs, related to the investigation of the July 23 incident involving Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY) is actively requesting investigation materials related to an incident involving Jeffrey Epstein in jail on July 23, 2019.
The incident and its investigation occurred while Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York under registration number 76318-054.
The request emphasizes that the investigation is still open and the materials should not be disseminated further, indicating an active and sensitive inquiry.
The correspondence shows procedural steps, requiring a written request (even just an email) from the prosecutor's office to the correctional facility's legal counsel to obtain the documents.
